mapper.update: merge into member_email_identify using dual on (member_email = #{memberEmail}) when matched then update set identify_key = #{identifyKey} when not matched then insert (member_email, identify_key) values (#{memberEmail}, #{identifyKey})
mapper.select: select count(*) from (select distinct d_order_no from member_direct_order where d_product_no = #{prodNo})
select count(*) from (select distinct d_product_no from direct_product left join direct_product_option using(d_product_no) where member_id = #{memberId} and d_sale_status = #{dSaleStatus})
select * from direct_order where d_order_no in(select d_order_no from member_direct_order where d_product_no = #{prodNo}) and d_order_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
